channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 15:47 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Manganese territorial community artillery shelling. Walk into shelter!
item.description: 🔴 15:47 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Manganese territorial community artillery shelling. Walk into shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 14:50 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 14:50 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast follow the following messages.#Kharkiv_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 14:18 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further messages.

item.title: 🟠 14:00 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. The 24 -hour free hotline on issues will be urgently evacuated from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 08003392911 Vacacing of civilian population - 08003339291
